mapper.select: SELECT NUM, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, ID, PASSWD, EMAIL, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, PHONENUMBER FROM LOGIN_TB ORDER BY num DESC
SELECT NUM, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, ID, PASSWD, EMAIL, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, PHONENUMBER FROM LOGIN_TB WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOGIN_TB(FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, ID, PASSWD, EMAIL, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, PHONENUMBER) VALUES (#{firstname}, #{lastname}, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{phonenumber})
